text: Mahmut Şevket Karman (16 May 1912 - 3 October 1989) was a Turkish alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Turkish male alpine skiers Category:Turkish male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Turkey Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Turkey Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Trabzon
title: Mahmut Şevket Karman
